prompts: Create a muscular Pokemon that showcases strength with powerful limbs and a determined expression.
Imagine a fighting-type Pokemon with a tough exterior and a confident stance, ready for battle.
Design a Pokemon that embodies resilience and toughness, with a prominent physique and strong features.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, exhibiting both strength and agility.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with a fierce look, exhibiting a blend of gray and yellow colors.
Make a character that is known for its combat skills and robust body, suitable for gym battles.
Give me a powerful Pokemon with a humanoid shape, showcasing its fighting prowess through its pose.
